security: This document does not contain information that would be considered sensitive from a security perspective. It is a routine business letter regarding unpaid rent.
summary: A rent reminder sent by Sumit Hill Properties, Inc. to Roger Shea for an overdue payment of $210.00 for August 1964.
summary_one_paragraph: On August 17, 1964, Sumit Hill Properties, Inc. issued a reminder to Roger Shea, residing at 6500 16th St., #G-32, Silver Spring, MD, regarding an unpaid rent of $210.00 due since August 1, 1964. The letter advises Mr. Shea that rents are payable in full within ten days of the due date and requests prompt payment.
title: Rent Reminder
